WorkItem.Description:
I downloaded b14 yesterday, and have been noticing strange numbers when looking at the DPS charts in Rawr: Mage. For some reason, all the gear values are in the 10s of thousands (looking at head gear for example, the values displayed range from 21800.34 to 55067.94).
 
I'm not sure what I'm looking at here: are these messed up DPS values (which may be the case, since the DPS value under "Solution" is listing at 504,042.40 for a gear set I created for my KZ/ZA mage) or if these are supposed to be some sort of other value (like a gear rating score).
 
All the spell-specific info (that found in the "Spell Info" section) seems accurate, as spells are in realistic value ranges (such as Fireball displaying a 1209.93 DPS).

Comments.Message:
To Note: This was happening on a gear set I created after importing my profile from the armory, and then running an optimize for DPS.

I just tried, and fresh load from the armory seems to display values properly.
This was a bug that cropped up under a few specific circumstances. It was fixed in b14.1, please upgrade.
